description:
Kindle authors can make a LOT more sales when they learn how to use Goodreads - a social networking site of over 12 million readers.

The problem is, when you go onto Goodreads on your own, it can be very overwhelming. Many people have created accounts and then left for good -- overcome by tons of options, with no idea what to do next.

This course is designed to help you hone in on exactly what you need - the top 7 ways to use Goodreads to make more book sales.

As a book author, you'll want to know as many ways as possible to get more book sales. And Goodreads has a LOT of eager readers who would love to read your book. You just need to know how to find them.

This course gives you each of the top 7 methods, along with instructional videos, and then a daily/weekly/monthly checklist to ensure you have a STRUCTURE with which to do everything.

To be clear... this is NOT designed to give you a comprehensive overview of Goodreads. It is not a Goodreads "Bible".

It's specifically designed for new Goodreads users to cut out all the "noise" and give you the most impactful methods to make more book sales.
title: Goodreads secrets: How Kindle authors can sell more books
